head.title: First post on the website
head.description: I've been wanting to finish this up for a while, but here it is finally! This is my personal landing page where I'll upload stuff that Iâ€¦

body:
I've been wanting to finish this up for a while, but here it is finally! This is my personal landing page where I'll upload stuff that I find interesting to talk about (could be related to triathlon, cycling, programming...).

I'll also shortly upload my resume!
